query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_streaks (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  currentStreak INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  longestStreak INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  lastActivityDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
  totalActiveDays INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS badges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  icon VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(20),
  requirement TEXT,
  points INT DEFAULT 0,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_badges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  badgeId INT NOT NULL,
  earnedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  metadata TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS daily_activity_log (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  activityDate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  minutesSpent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  coursesAccessed INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  modulesCompleted INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_date (userId, activityDate)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS daily_activity_log (

  userId INT NOT NULL,
  activityDate VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  minutesSpent INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

  modulesCompleted INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,

  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_date (userId, activityDate)
